body:
## Release Notes

- Remove codeql from toktok-stack for now. @iphydf (#192)
- Remove "WIP" status check. @iphydf (#191)
- Make some of the new CI checks mandatory. @iphydf (#190)
- Remove hound; add missing hs- repo checks. @iphydf (#189)
- Add new haskell repos. @iphydf (#188)
- Moved infer from circleci to github actions. @iphydf (#185)
- Remove windows from required checks in zig-toxcore-c. @iphydf (#187)
- Add .github repo to the settings list. @iphydf (#186)
- Add test/lint to zig-toxcore-c required checks. @iphydf (#184)
- Make msvc builds in c-toxcore required checks. @iphydf (#183)
- Correctly namespaced checks in hs-tokstyle. @iphydf (#182)
- Add netlify to required checks on hs-toxcore. @iphydf (#180)
- Allow pushes to experimental without reviews. @iphydf (#181)
- Add more toxcore CI checks to required. @iphydf (#179)
- Minor cleanups in label sync code. @iphydf (#178)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#176)
- Add labels to settings. @iphydf (#177)
- Add some settings validations. @iphydf (#175)
- Add hub-settings tool to sync settings from yaml to github. @iphydf (#174)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#173)
- Disable targets for cross-compilation. @iphydf (#172)
- Make haskell code visible to ghci. @iphydf (#171)
- add myself to the trusted authors @Green-Sky (#170)
name: v0.1.3
